about_the_game:
DEFY GRAVITY

Gravity Forge offers the player an extra degree of freedom in both movement and combat. The environment becomes a weapon. You can walk on walls, create gravity wells, change mass, and discover new ways to interact with the world. This is a spatial shooter, spatial imagination is your weapon.

THEY ARE LEGION

Slay hordes of biomechs along with stand-out elite enemies, powered by an internally-brewed technology. We aim for good optimization even on mid-level PCs.

CO-OP FRENZY

Bringing your friends to double the fun, combining your abilities for better effectiveness in a spectacular dance of death. But be careful with explosives and gravity tricks, as friendly fire damage is on!

FORGE YOUR DESTINY

Gaston City is a beautiful and dangerous place. It’s a technogenic dystopia, visually blending elements of dieselpunk and biopunk with the elegance of Art Nouveau and Art Deco.

Take on the role of Elsa and her squadmates, adventurous treasure hunters. A major heist goes south and the team must face the consequences while dealing with the infamous “Living Magnet” technology in its deadliest manifestations.

We use all the capabilities of Unreal Engine 5 to convey the absolute beauty of the game world intertwined with the oppressive atmosphere of a society distorted by technology.

MADE FOR THE PLAYERS

We design the game with passion, aiming for it to be a dense, punchy experience for you and your friends.

And as a team that values and stays connected to its community, we look forward to your feedback.

The game is currently in pre-Alpha, and your feedback can help us shape it in the best way possible. By joining our Discord server, you can expect regular playtests, Q&A sessions with developers, and other events. And unlike the cliched statements of mega-corps, your opinion really matters to us.

So if you're interested in joining the creative process, welcome to our community on Discord!

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages or may not be appropriate for viewing at work.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 2600X / Intel Core i5-8600K
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 6 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 580 / Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 75 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 30 FPS in 1920x1080 with the "Low" preset.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (1903 min)/11 64-bit
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 7 5800X / Intel Core i7-12700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 8 GB VRAM, AMD Radeon RX 6800 XT / Nvidia GeForce RTX 3070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 75 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD required. 60 FPS in 1920x1080 with the "Ultra" preset.

short_description: Master gravity and parkour skills to slay hordes of enemies. As an elegant assassin, you can play solo or in co-op with friends.
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Ukrainian
*languages with full audio support
